functions.name: cosmosdb_account_private_endpoints_enabled
functions.description: Checks if private endpoints are enabled for CosmosDB Account.

functions.name: cosmosdb_account_limit_firewall_networks
functions.description: Checks if firewall networks are limited for CosmosDB Account.

functions.name: cosmosdb_account_private_endpoints_usage
functions.description: Checks usage of private endpoints for CosmosDB Account.

functions.name: cosmosdb_account_use_aad_and_rbac
functions.description: Checks if AAD and RBAC are used for CosmosDB Account.

notes: All functions are based on Azure Cosmosdb_Account API.
Ensure proper Azure RBAC permissions are configured.
Consider regional vs global service differences.
Implement appropriate retry logic for API calls.
Use Azure Resource Graph for efficient resource queries.
